website_summaries.verdict: A gentle, milky cleanser from a well-loved French beauty brand that is totally hypoallergenic.
pros: Contains grape seed and almond oils to nourish skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines
Designed to moisturize dry skin and brighten up overall complexion

website_summaries.verdict: This all-natural product is most suitable for dry skin.
pros: Made of natural organic ingredients for the environmentally conscious
Good for sensitive skin as it doesn’t leave it feeling dry or raw
cons: You’ll need another product to take off make-up
Those with oily skin felt it left a greasy feeling

customer_reviews.title: Changed my skin
customer_reviews.text: This whole anti-aging collection is a god send. I am in my thirties and my skin became much more sensitive in the last few years. I wanted to make a switch to more natural products. I tried Simple, Oz Naturals, Burt's Bees, and some smaller brands before trying Andalou. This is the best my skin has looked in years. Softer, more moisturized, less prone to breakouts. I have been using this cleanser with the day lotion, night cream, and lip balm. I would absolutely recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I mostly like Andalou products. However, this was not one of my favorites. It did not take all the makeup / eyeliner etc off. I have to follow up with another cleanser to get everything off end of the day. This would be ideal cleanser to use in the morning to freshen up.
customer_reviews.author: m3gm

customer_reviews.title: Same product....smells off?
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through several bottles of this cleanser however when I opened the bottle from my last order the smell is very "off". Does not smell the same (like fresh apricots) as it normally does. It seems to be working the same but I don't enjoy using it as much because of the smell. Bad batch perhaps? Expired? I'm not sure but hopefully the product has not been changed.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy19

customer_reviews.title: Brings the softness back.
customer_reviews.text: Well, Amazon had a deal on some face Vitamin C serum that wreaked havoc on my face. I ended up buying this face wash and I also bought the day moisturizer (SPF) and the night cream. They brought the moisture back to my skin and repaired the itchy,dry,scaly skin that the serum did. I exfoliate twice a week with St Ives because though this face wash is great..my skin needs a good scrubbing once in a while. With this regime my face has been more supple,soft and youthful. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaGulia

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but I'm so impressed with these products that I felt inspired to write one. I originally purchased the anti aging sample pack to try it out. I wasn't expecting much considering the fact that I had been playing a LOT more for moisture and foundation. These products feel so light in my skin and leave it feeling plump and soft. I love the smell of the daily cream as well. I will never go back to the expensive creams and chemicals I was using previously!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie J

customer_reviews.title: Great gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cleanser because of the anti aging ingredients, and I was looking for a gentle non foaming cleanser. I use it in the morning to wash off my heavier moisturizer and to get my skin ready for my morning routine and makeup if i'm wearing it that day. It does not strip your skin, and the milky consistency leaves your skin feeling soft but clean. I find it does not work well to remove makeup for me, but using it in the morning that's not a problem. It's also good for your second cleanse if you are using a heavier oil type cleanser to remove your makeup first.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I found a travel size of this product at the grocery store and I liked it so much I bought a full size. I apply one pump of it with a little water and then remove it with a wet washcloth. It's a mild creamy cleanser that doesn't dry my skin and has a nice light apricot fragrance. I really recommend removing it with a washcloth, I think if you just splash it off you won't get your skin completely clean, especially if you've got makeup on -- it doesn't remove eye makeup well - you'd need a different cleanser for that.
customer_reviews.author: loves cake too much

customer_reviews.title: I got rid of acne.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous cleansing milk for keeping your skin clean and smooth. Do not irritate eyes. TIPS: Firstly clean your eyebrows and eyes makeup (this milk works great I like miccelar water more) and then use 2-3 pumps of milk on your dry skin, massage it gently and use a hot wet small cotton towel to clean off. Rinse the towel and put it on the face (feels like the real spa) and the use a toner and moisturizer. Make sure you use only good-ingredients ones like Andalou products. My skin is clean now since I use this milk and no overdrying cleansing gels or foams. I also wear mineral powder foundation instead of pharmacy-brands.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face wash EVER. And I've tried nearly all.
customer_reviews.text: It's so soft on the skin but also removes makeup so well. I don't understand how it works its magic. I often don't even need moisturizer afterwards because it leaves my skin feeling moisturized already. Nothing harsh, nothing that stings my face with chemicals or scratches my skin. Just a smooth, pleasant cleansing. Rub in, wash off, and I'm done. I bought the travel size as well (yes, they have it!) and have recommended it to many friends. I'm a customer for life. Nothing else compares.
customer_reviews.author: elinaoli3

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t take off my makeup....... I put it on my face and roll the product hoping it’ll melt away makeup after wiping it down with face wipes . After washing, it leaves both makeup (definitely not waterproof anything and foundation) and a glossiness that feels like you didn’t properly wash off a oily pan. I prefer face balms and/or oils.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Dont recommend, sticky feeling
customer_reviews.text: This product does not remove makeup and leaves a film like texture on your skin after wards, even after using a second cleanser after this one i could still feel it on my skin, it felt sticky and gross, they do not issue refunds on this product so keep that in mind also, i dont know if i got a fake product or what but this cleanser was worse than some drugstore products ive had. DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Creamy
customer_reviews.text: I love Andalou products but I won't be ordering this one again. It is creamy and moisturizing which is great but my skin doesn't feel "clean" after using it. I rely on my moisturizer to add that creamy feeling to my skin but, before I use a moisturizer, I want my skin to feel clean.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Just wow
customer_reviews.text: This product honestly smells heavenly. I truly have very sensitive skin along with eczema so finding products that help my skin along with a good clean is very hard. I get clogged pores at times so I recently began using another natural cleanser, especially for deep cleansing. I have added this product and when I use it I feel like I am nurturing my skin back to health. I can literally feel the moisture and softness restored to my face almost instantly. I don't feel like I am stripping my skin just to get a good clean. It feels more like giving back to my face than stripping away from it. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apricot milk cleanser
customer_reviews.text: My favorite product from Andalou. Smells amazing and is so refreshing, skin feels clean and moisturized without any excess product or film on my skin. Gentle enough to use 2x/ day.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Walther

customer_reviews.title: Good Cleanser for Sensitive, Dry & Mature Skin
customer_reviews.text: Andelou Apricot is a pleasant, light, creamy texture cleanser. You need a bit if water to "emulsify" it. In my opinion, it's very good for sensitive skin and dry or mature anti/aging skin. I'm 61, with good skin, but prone to dryness. While I like this product, sometimes I want and require other type cleansers depending on the weather, fluctuations, etc. I would definitely recommend Abdalou.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Adopter

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and moisturizing like lotion applied to face
customer_reviews.text: No smell, very moisturizing perhaps too much for me. Leaves a slight residue but maybe it’s for moisture. Others may like that, I didn’t. Doesn’t feel like it really cleaned my skin and maybe the milk or probiotic gave my normal to combination, non acne skin break outs. Could not use more than a few times. I eliminated only this from my routine each time I added it back my skin broke out. I left a review because I found others helpful whenever shopping, hopefully this helps someone else too.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value and it left my skin feeling quite soft. I appreciate the natural ingredients and it being sulfate free, I do however feel like I can still feel it on my face after rinsing. It does not lather at all so I end up using more than I usually would to do the job, and that's even using itnwas my 2nd cleanse. That being said, I have had no negative effects from it so I will continue to use it and may even buy again since it is so affordable.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Good other than the orange oil
customer_reviews.text: Orange oil is sensitizing. This should not be marketed for sensitive skin. I kept ending up at the dermatologist for skin rashes. I finally figured out why. Most of these products contain orange oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: made me breakout
customer_reviews.text: This product caused me to breakout. The smell is a subtle apricot scent. It doesn't make any bubbles when I use my facial cleansing brush. My boyfriend now uses it and he loves it. I will stick to the 1000 roses cleansing foam and Sibu Sea Berry Therapy Polishing Facial Cleanser. those 2 are the only ones that work for me and fight my hormonal acne.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for my taste
customer_reviews.text: This feels too greasy for me. I know it says for older skin and normally products for older skin are almost usually heavier on the oily side but it's just too much for me. Maybe I'll use it on a harsh winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't remove foundation and causes pimples
customer_reviews.text: Update: caused 3 big nasty pimples. Throwing it away. Consistenct of body lotion. I use Revlon Colorstay and despite using a lot of this and rubbing it in then rinsing with warm water, my face was still covered in foundation. I have to use a face wipe to remove the foundation before using this. May be better in the morning when there isn't makeup on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser really made my skin feel soft and smooth. I like that it has probiotics and apricot oil in it. The only thing is that it does have a scent, and i usually only use fragrance free products. However, the scent was very nice, and it was natural and mild. For anyone who likes scented skin care, this is the ultimate face cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have combination oily/dry and sensitive skin. I love this face wash because it takes off eye makeup great, is moisturizing and doesn't make me break out. It also has a nice scent. I've used other face washes but I find myself coming back to this one time and time again.
customer_reviews.author: elle s crocker

customer_reviews.title: Beware if sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work!! The smell is great, and it does truly noirish your skin. Felt soft after using. I use their hair products and love them!! I have such sensitive skin and this just caused me to rash and break out. I don't necessarily think it's the products fault, I just can't use most, back to trying new things...
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mornings! (not night)
customer_reviews.text: Used as a morning wash. It's gentle, cleansing, refreshing and moisturizing. I combine it with a Dr Haushka Toner and Weleda sensitive skin Almond Face Lotion. I definitely need something stronger at night bc this will not effectively get all the dirt off my face.
customer_reviews.author: T. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser for my acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: If I use foaming cleansers, my skin gets very dry and then very oily to compensate. This cleanser is very gentle and moisturizing, so it does not over-dry my skin yet it seems to do a great job cleaning off the day's dirt. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Koi

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Great product I’ve bought it many times and love it each time. I love how fast it comes in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great creme cleasner, love it for my combo skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, have pretty sensitive skin and it's not stripping or drying at all. I really like the scent, just a mild berry scent. Not foamy, just a great creamy cleanser. Rinses off well with a clean washcloth and cool water, no residue. My skin is very happy. I am a new convert to andalou, and have been very pleased with everything i've tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: dannymac

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't remove my waterproof mascara very well without a lot of effort and rubbing but it doesn't break me out so that's a plus. Rinses clean just wish it wash better at deep cleaning. I doubt I'll buy this again though.
customer_reviews.author: Nyx

customer_reviews.title: Andalou Naturals ALWAYS do what they say they'll do
customer_reviews.text: Used it for years and still do. Remarkably good. Environmental Working Group, which grades products for their purity, lack of toxic chemicals, gives Andalou Naturals the very highest and best rating. ALL of them.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia  Summer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible residue left behind...NO THNK YOU
customer_reviews.text: This product was HORRIBLE for me. It left an odd residue of sticky dead skin on my face...and that’s with using a silicone scrubber. And they do not offer refunds so be beware before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Cbrown

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser/ Help with some acne
customer_reviews.text: From high school until now I've suffered from acne. A year ago I decided to use face products that were free of animal cruelty. First I use Burt's bees which I did very badly. Then I tried this brand bought a traveler kit. Then I tried another Neutralyze brand that made my face worse after 15 days stop using it and I bought this brand and this line again. I love that my face is cleaner. My acne and spots have decreased quite a bit. I will not change it.
customer_reviews.author: kira v.

customer_reviews.title: Best face cleanser I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: And I've used alot! I have oily skin but it also tends to be dry after washing. My esthetician suggested I try something that is a "milk" or "cream" based cleanser. I've gone through 5 or 6 bottles of this product now, and it has been fantastic in maintaining the balance of my skin. I would use it as a second cleanser after makeup remover since it is pretty gentle, it doesn't really get rid of full foundation or eye make up.
customer_reviews.author: LXZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have very sensitive skin that will dry out and become flaky with red patches if I am not careful what I put on it. This product cleans off make-up and leave my face soft and clean. And it smells very nice, too. I am on my second bottle and will continue to purchase it. Just for reference, I am 53 with dry, sensitive, fair, skin.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMay

customer_reviews.title: This cleanser smells amazing and makes my skin feel very healthy
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser smells amazing and makes my skin feel very healthy, clean, and moisturized (not stripped! yay!) after I use it. It does a good job at removing makeup, although I find that I need a to use a little bit of facial oil under my eyes to remove all eye makeup residue. Unfortunately, I think this product has been causing me to break out. I do have very sensitive, oily skin. This cleansing milk is probably better suited for dryer, less acne-prone skin types that need gentle cleansing.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Gould

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty happy with how gentle this cleanser is on the skin. It is not abrasive at all, it feels like you are washing your face with lotion. I apply it over my face and rub it off with a warm damp cloth. I finish it with a toner and moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: LL.

customer_reviews.title: Really good for sensitive skin but it's kind of greasy
customer_reviews.text: It is super gentle for sensitive skin but it felt kind of greasy afterwards. I know it's supposed to be moisturizing but I already have lotions and stuff for that. I felt like this left a layer of grease or oil or something on my face and that my other products wouldn't get absorbed by my skin. Maybe all you need is this moisturizing cleanser but I'd rather use my lotion
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: A dream for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this cleanser. It smells like an absolute dream. It’s so moisturizing for my sensitive, redness-prone, acne-prone skin. I like to pair it with my clairsonic. I would highly recommend this to anybody with sensitive skin in need of repair.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Facial Wash
customer_reviews.text: Good products ! Some facial product smells can get overwhelming, really like the smell of this one.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Does not remove make-up well
customer_reviews.text: This is a light creamy cleanser. I am not too crazy about it only because it does not remove make-up easily. I am using a different cleanser now as it does a great job in removing make-up and moisturizes my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: YES for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have combination and extremely sensitive skin. This will be the 4th time I’ll be repurchasing. I even got my fiancé on it and we both swear it cleans our skin sooo good without drying out. It basically feels like a lotion. When I travel, I put it in a tiny twist off container which is so nice because I don’t have to worry about it getting everywhere. 100% recommend for people with any skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Vtran6@student.cscc.edu

customer_reviews.title: Natural and Gentle
customer_reviews.text: I’m very careful about the ingredients I use on my skin. This cleanser is the most natural I could find for a reasonable price. It’s not drying and smells great without chemical fragrance. I’ve been using it for about 6 months. In summertime I combine it with an exfoliating cleanser every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H.

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to say I'm disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st Andalou product I've been disappointed in and I've used a lot! It DOES NOT remove makeup. I've tried it with heavy makeup and with very light makeup with zero success. It feels very moisturizing but I needed a cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this when washing my face in the morning. It cleanses quite well and doesn't dry skin; doesn't cause any bad reactions either, which is essential to me because I have very sensitive skin. This probably won't remove makeup well, but I use a different wash for that at night.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyStar

customer_reviews.title: Does not work - is not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product is worthless. I complained directly to andalou support and they said "It is first recommended to remove sunscreen and makeup with a makeup remover before cleansing the face with a facial cleanser" no where in the advertising for this product does it say you need to use another product first.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baur

customer_reviews.title: Very good for inflamed
customer_reviews.text: Very good for inflamed, "angry" sensitive skin, for washing your face after a Bikram class, as well as after engaging in outdoor activities at very low temperatures. Very gentle, yet does the job of thoroughly cleaning one's face, even removing light to moderate make-up. Loved the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product. My skin has not looked so healthy in years. It also has cleared up my acne and bad complexion I have had since cancer treatment. I can't say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: diane v.

customer_reviews.title: Best natural facial cleanser for sensitive and aging skin.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Andalou facial products for many years and I could not be happier with them. This facial cleanser is gentle but very deep and thorough. I love it. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: me_jane

customer_reviews.title: Feels good after using.
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product fir skin cleansing. Nice improvement in face complexion
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny...and more.
customer_reviews.text: This product has been so good for my skin. I have very fair skin, and am not as good as I should be about wearing sunscreen or any make-up. But since I started using this cleanser, I can tell my skin is much happier. Softer, clearer, less dry. This product was recommended to me by an esthetician.
customer_reviews.author: Kate L.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this once, but I love it! Extremely gentle and it left my skin feeling clean and super soft! Would recommend to anyone with sensitive skin like myself. What a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product line. The cleansing milk takes off all of my makeup and it has a very pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff for my dry sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, sensitive skin. Most cleansers irritate my skin. This one does not. I love it. Feels good, cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about how much I love this cleanser. It smells divine. I bought the natural blossom and leaf toner to work alongside the cleanser. I love them and love that they are so affordable. Sure hope they continue to carry this line here on Amazon. Others out there are great but way too pricey. This one is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: MizPosey

customer_reviews.title: UNUSABLE... phew! Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This product stunk so badly, I couldn't even use it to know if it worked well. Absolutely disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Earley

customer_reviews.title: No more heavenly scent?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cleanser for almost two years and normally love the scent. It’s why I keep coming back to it. However, my recent purchase of this cleaner seems to be unscented. Possibly a fake? Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Will keep using!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this twice now, I really like it and it smells great. Work a well and makes my face feel soft and clean after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Navarrette

customer_reviews.title: Mild, non-irritating.
customer_reviews.text: Mild, non-irritating. Other soaps, cleansers, and creams aggregate sebhorreic dermatitis on my eyelid and this product helps to moisturize and cleanse without irritating. It takes a little bit to get used to if you have only used soap previously because it leaves your face with the feeling of light moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Gigit

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin! Not over-drying and doesn't leave a residue. I had received a sample and had to order the full size product. This was the best price :)
customer_reviews.author: SJoyner

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin's BFF
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin that reacts poorly to many cleansers and facial wipes. This product is my new best friend! It is gentle, moisturizing, cleans off my waterproof makeup with ease, and smells delicious! I keep it in the shower and use it daily! I can tell a difference throughout the day in the hydration and softness of my face when I use this! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: lallie'tjie

customer_reviews.title: Takes off waterproof makeup
customer_reviews.text: I use the apricot cleanser as a makeup remover before cleaning with the citrus cleanser. Slight apricot smell; think St Ive’s type apricot but more complex. Smells nice. It takes off waterproof mascara!
customer_reviews.author: JPD

customer_reviews.title: So fresh and so clean
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of cream cleansers, this one is my favorite. It removes makeup, even eye makeup yet it’s gentle. My skin feels clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: Favorite milk cleanser!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has a lovely apricot scent. It's very creamy, with a consistency like thick hair conditioner. It doesn't foam, but rinses off very cleanly. This does not dry out my skin. I love the ingredient list for this face wash too - nothing questionable. For this price you can't do better. This is now my favorite cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great facial wash for all agea
customer_reviews.text: I’m about to order another one! I also get it for my 13 year old granddaughter, she loves it, her skin is beautiful !
customer_reviews.author: Carlene Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a few years it is easy to use and feels wonderful on your face
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to clean face
customer_reviews.text: Very good facial cleanser. Creamy, natural. As with most facial cleansers it does not entirely remove makeup, still need to use a toner.
customer_reviews.author: md22

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and have to be very careful about what I use on my face. This is awesome. It really helps and has cut down on breakouts
customer_reviews.author: Kenda Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am very fickle, picky and do not want to spend a fortune on skin care products. I rarely buy the same product twice. I always check the EWG /Cosmetics Database rating, this is a 1; I avoid products rated higher than a 2. This cleanser is perfect for winter. It has a light pleasant scent; it's creamy yet still cleanses very well. It leaves my skin soft with no itching. My skin is combo but gets quite dry in the winter. I have been using it for several years and plan to continue. I can't find it locally anymore and am glad Amazon carries it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing, very moisturizing, and great for normal makeup but not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Le Lapin Blanc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful natural product
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle and never have dry skin. Absorbs quickly with no residue. Practically no smell. Doesn’t set off my migraines or allergies!
customer_reviews.author: John C Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell right.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed. I’ve not used this product before but it smells old and kind of rancid. I tried to get it replaced and it’s not eligible for a return.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Did not cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Did not make my face feel clean but left a waxy feeling residue. Did not suds up.
customer_reviews.author: DutchFam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted! High quality! Good ingredients of the product! I was waiting for the parcel. I'm happy! I want to buy the whole series! Thank you so much seller! My face looks so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Wake up to apricots!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cleanser I switched to from using an Acure cream cleanser. This is super light but really enriches my skin. I highly recommend this product, I've been using it for a couple years now.
customer_reviews.author: taj

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash! Doesn’t dry out my skin or make me breakout. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Warber

customer_reviews.title: It’s soothing
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product it cleans well and it’s all natural.
customer_reviews.author: helpmerhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great natural face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Great natural product that cleans well and doesn’t leave the skin feeling tight after washing. I like that it’s made without any harsh chemicals, parabens, phaltaes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Back to Natural...
customer_reviews.text: Good ingredients that are good for your skin and body!
customer_reviews.author: BohemianGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom, she loves it and I can see the difference/improvements in her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Celph Wealth

customer_reviews.title: Not for makeup removal
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars ⭐️ it’s creamy, good for sensitive skin, but is poor at getting any kind of makeup off. So if you like to just wash, tone, serum, moisturize etc this is not a good enough cleanser to remove makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the feel or smell of this product. I will not be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Better than expensive competitors
customer_reviews.text: Completely as awesome as any expensive cream cleanser, more gentle, not drying, and smells great. Need very little to wash effectively. I am a 40yr old white woman with normal to dry skin AND acne.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Needed a something very mild, this wasn't it, stings when I used it, didnt remove any makeup from my face, could not even return. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal R.

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: I love how this cleanser makes my skin feel. I have very dry skin. Great at removing eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: PamM

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent. Really like this product, cleans well. Good for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Krafft

customer_reviews.title: A Gentle Way to Take the Day Away
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it do a good job of taking the makeup and grime off, but it's made out of good things that never mess with my skin. Comes off easily leaving skin feeling soft as heck. Love these products!!
customer_reviews.author: sillydog

customer_reviews.title: stuck in bottom
customer_reviews.text: It gets all stuck at the bottom and it's a waste. You can't even tap it out. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Arabrab

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: It's too thick. Doesn't really clean. It feels nice though. I prefer the Meyer lemon one.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Cruzado

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Really Clean
customer_reviews.text: I personally like very mild cleansers, but this does not remove any makeup at all, I have to use like a tablespoon worth to get my foundation off.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Would give it Zero Stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: I read that this was good for sensitive skin like mine... However after it left my skin burning, red, and dry
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product- feels great on the face, reasonably priced and love the apricot scent! I only wish their 'matching products' (spray toner and moisturizer) came in the same scent.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Medwied

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and cleansing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several years now. It is gentle on my skin, where other products have dried out my skin or caused irritation and breakouts. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and soothing
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive, combination, and acne prone skin. This cleanser is gentle, soothing, and smells great. It keeps my acne down and doesnt dry me out but isnt the best at removing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: breezy

customer_reviews.title: Great Smelling product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so much really anything Andalou at this point I'm sold have tried a lot of the products so far all amazing. A great price point for such an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: Saved my skin from hormonal breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for over 2 years now. I love the consistency and scent. I was having really bad hormonal breakouts with deep pimples and cysts and this cleanser has stopped my breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smells
customer_reviews.text: I got the Apricot for me and Citrus kombucha for my husband. They both smell amazingly. The citrus one is for oily skin though. I felt too dry after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Just a customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome is the word for these products
customer_reviews.text: Awesome is the word for these products, my skin looks so clear and youthful. I first got these as gifts from my daughter, now I cannot do without them. They have Age-Defying products that help keep your skin feeling soft and is all natural.
customer_reviews.author: Pammey

customer_reviews.title: Apricot milk cleanser is second only to Rose Foam cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent and feel of this apricot milk cleanser. Feels very smooth & seems to cleanse well. I have to admit though that I’m more fond of my Rose Foam cleanser! When my apricot runs out, I’ll go back to Rose. That is heavenly!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice soft scent leaves skin feeling g soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: The Andalou apricot probiotic cleanser is a wonderfully gentle but thorough cleanser. It has a nice apricot scent. I would recommend this cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Hope E. Plack

product_meta.title: Andalou Naturals Apricot Probiotic Cleansing Milk 6 Ounce
product_meta.description: Andalou Naturals embodies beauty in action. We infuse the best of nature and knowledge into mindful and effective products that are good for people and the planet. Our skin care, hair care and body care products are made thoughtfully and beautifully, blending advanced Fruit Stem Cell Science with natural and fair-trade ingredients, with a minimum 70% certified organic content, for visible and healthy results. The meaning of Andalou is ‘Path of Light’, and we believe it best reflects our intention to foster good things in the world and enrich the lives we touch, one responsible product at a time.
feature_bullets: PROBIOTIC CLEANSER FOR DRY SKIN: Our Apricot Probiotic Cleansing Milk uses probiotics & resveratrol CoQ10, blended with apricot & borage oils, to gently cleanse makeup & impurities from the skin & pores.

AGE DEFYING, NATURE INSPIRED: Andalou Naturals Age Defying skincare products help hydrate dry skin & fight fine lines & wrinkles with restorative antioxidants. Use as directed to support a youthful look.
INGREDIENTS FROM NATURE: We support Superior Source Ingredient Standards & only use ingredients that are organic, non-GMO, gluten free, sustainable, fair trade, cruelty free, & nature-derived.

FRUIT STEM CELL SCIENCE: Every Andalou Natural's product—including masks, creams, serums, moisturizers, cleansers, & toners—use nature's antioxidant defense solution to protect & support healthy skin & hair.

ANDALOU NATURALS: We are the first Non-GMO Project Verified beauty brand & our commitment to uplifting people & the planet is reflected in our hair products, cleansers, lotions, serums, face masks & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
